@Order(1) @Configuration public class ApiWebSecurityConfig extends org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
This configuration handles api web requests with stateless session.

    • configure

      protected void configure (org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity http) throws Exception
      Override this method to configure the HttpSecurity. Typically, subclasses should not call super as it may override their configuration.
      Overrides:
      configure in class org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
      Parameters:
      http - the HttpSecurity to modify.
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown when error happens during authentication.
